channel.title: How to change Wild to NON Wild
channel.description:
Hey Moparscape, i really need help changing my new home so its non wild. HELP ME PLEASE??????!?!?!?!?!!?!?
my NorthEastCorner: X-3267 Y-3504 my SouthWestCorner: X-3233 Y-3429
IF SOMEONE COULD TELL ME HOW TO PUT THAT TOGETHER I WOULD APPRECIATE IT! THANKS!

item.title: How to change Wild to NON Wild
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

In the nonWild() method, include the coordinates of the area.

Ok here is what i have.

public boolean nonWild()
{
if ((absX >= 3233 && absX <= 3267 && absY >= 3504 && absY <= 3429)

Is this correct if my:
NEcorneris: X-3267 Y-3504
SWcorneris: X-3233 Y3429

Is that correct? And if it’s wrong can you tell me how to put it in correct? Thanks.

item.title: How to change Wild to NON Wild
item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

Open client.java

Search for:

public boolean multiCombat() {

You see something like that:

public boolean multiCombat() { if((absX >= 3144 && absX <= 3184 && absY >= 3519 && absY <=3656) || (absX >= 3185 && absX <= 3350 && absY >= 3502 && absY <=3900) || (absX >= 2983 && absX <= 3007 && absY >= 3905 && absY <=3917) || (absX >= 3007 && absX <= 3075 && absY >= 3608 && absY <=3713) || (absX >= 2944 && absX <= 2963 && absY >= 3812 && absY <=3827) || (absX >= 3041 && absX <= 3057 && absY >= 3869 && absY <=3883) || (absX >= 3157 && absX <= 3181 && absY >= 3874 && absY <=3895) || (absX >= 2720 && absX <= 2760 && absY >= 5073 && absY <=5114) || (absX >= 2256 && absX <= 2287 && absY >= 4680 && absY <=4711) || (absX >= 2360 && absX <= 2445 && absY >= 5045 && absY <= 5125) || (absX >= 2760 && absX <= 2780 && absY >= 2790 && absY <=2810) || (absX >= 2624 && absX <= 2690 && absY >= 2550 && absY <=2619) || (absX >= 3460 && absX <= 3520 && absY >= 9470 && absY <=9530) || (absX >= 2371 && absX <= 2424 && absY >= 5125 && absY <=5167) || (absX >= 2627 && absX <= 2677 && absY >= 4550 && absY <=4602) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3307 && absY >= 3904 && absY <=3952) || (absX >= 2420 && absX <= 2520 && absY >= 10100 && absY <=10200) || (absX >= 2992 && absX <= 3090 && absY >= 4804 && absY <=4872)) return true; else return false; }

Under that add:

public boolean isInPkBox() { if((absX >= 3233 && absX <= 3267 && absY >= 3429 && absY <=3504)) return true; else return false; }

Then search for:

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {

And put this under:

        if(isInPkBox()) return false;

Hope i helped you.

Read full topic
